value.stringValue: You Lead {!$Record.FirstName} has re-engaged, please review

decisions.description: Review the actual status and prior value to make the time stamps
decisions.name: Status
decisions.label: Status

textTemplates.name: bodyLeadReady
textTemplates.text: Hi! Your Lead "{!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}" has been moved to stage “Ready”, please review and follow up with the Lead. https://luxurypresence.lightning.force.com/{!$Record.Id} Kind regards,
